segments.text: I've read your report , and I'm not sure I agree with you.You think you can get attendance improved by requiring salaried employees to take their all of their sick days ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's right . I know it must sound crazy to you , but we believe there will be fewer absences this way .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We give them 10 or 15 sick days per year . Surely requiring people to take them couldn't possibly help . It sounds like a counter - productive policy change to me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Right now , we have incentives encouraging employees to come to work as often as possible.But employees with colds and the flu are coming to work and infecting their colleagues .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . So our current policies are encouraging sick people to come to work , resulting in more sick employees .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's right . If sick days were mandatory , sick people would stay home . We wouldn't have these company-wide epidemics .
